name: Ghostly Ruins
description:
Made For GMTK Jam 2022: "Roll of Dice" 

Story 

A prince goes to rescue a princess in a field full of demons. Play as the prince and get to the end of the game to be with her.

Controls
  • ASDW to move
  • Mouse to rotate camera
  • 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 to use items
Contributors
  • Jason "JasonXXR" Xu - jasonxxr.taplink.ws
